roboRallyPackage.pathFindingClasses
Class DijkstraSP

java.lang.Object
  roboRallyPackage.pathFindingClasses.DijkstraSP

public class DijkstraSP
extends java.lang.Object

Dijkstra's algorithm. Computes the shortest path tree. Assumes all weights are nonnegative.

Version:
26 april 2012
Author:
Jonas Schouterden (r0260385) & Nele Rober (r0262954) Bachelor Ingenieurswetenschappen, KULeuven
